Method Detail

copy

public static boolean copy(InputStream source,
                           OutputStream destination)
Copy an InputStream to an OutputStream. While this method will automatically close the destination OutputStream, the caller is responsible for closing the source InputStream.

Parameters:
source -
destination -
Returns:
true if the operation was successful; false otherwise (which includes a null input).
See Also:
http://java.sun.com/docs/books/performance/1st_edition/html/JPIOPerformance.fm.html#22980
